title: Best of the Program | Guests: David Barton & Rachel Bovard | 11/4/22
description:
WallBuilders founder David Barton joins to highlight the importance of protecting the integrity of our elections and what he’s doing to help stop election fraud on both sides of the political aisle. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, discussing the upcoming midterm election. Senior tech columnist for the Federalist Rachel Bovard lays out what Republicans should do if they gain control.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
